DataElement.preferredName: Lab Procedure Preference Unit of Measure Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Preferred unit of measure (UOM) for a laboratory test result, per NCI standards or per protocol specification.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lab Test Preference Unit of Measure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A predetermined quantity adopted as the preferred standard of measurement for a lab test result

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.

Concepts.definition: A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified used as a standard measurement of same kinds, such as pound or kilogram in measuring weight. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.
A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Unit of Measure Name
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Unit of measure standard values to describe a lab test result._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Unit of Measure Name
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified used as a standard measurement of same kinds, such as pound or kilogram in measuring weight. (NCI):The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

DataElement.changeDescription: Supports C3D lab test functionality.  Includes new version VD to correct a value meaning/value meaning description error in the previous VD version.
